featured.text:
Short for "Music And Gaming Festival," MAGFest is a four day-long event dedicated to the appreciation of video game music, gaming of all types, and the gaming community.


The event runs 24 hours a day, and offers consoles, arcades, tabletop, LAN, live video game cover bands, chiptunes, vendors, guest speakers, and much much more.
featured.title: MAGFest 2016

featured.text: There are some amazing smaller broadcasters on Twitch, and we want these rising stars to have an opportunity to showcase what they're all about. Hey folks! I'm Dan, a full-time partnered Twitch broadcaster who plays a lot of Action MMORPGs with a particular focus on the free-to-play D&D based MMO "Neverwinter". I cultivate a positive community over at my channel with guilds dedicated to you guys in each game we play. I'm also checking out Tera, Black Desert Online and Blade & Soul among other games.


Feel free to come and join in!

featured.text:
Cohh is a streamer with a focus on high viewer interactivity and a goal to always bring out the best in people. A guild leader of over a decade with a history of world firsts, Cohh is a gamer with a bottomless thirst for completion. With a focus on new MMO/general releases and streaming every day, Cohh continues forward with his community while maintaining a respectful and cheerful environment to make sure those watching have a great time. Stop by and say hello!
